Event.name: Cause_to_experience
Event.definition: <def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> intentionally seeks to bring about an internal mental or emotional state in the <fen>Experiencer</fen>. This frame in closely related to Experiencer_obj. <ex> <fex name="Agent">Samantha</fex> <t>terrorized</t> <fex name="Experiencer">the children</fex> <fex name="Resulting_action">into screaming</fex>. </ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> by which the <fen>Agent</fen> intentionally tries to bring about an internal mental or emotional state.</def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> is an External Argument of the target word and purposefully arouses an emotional state. </def-root>

Arg.name: Experiencer
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Experiencer</fen> is the person the <fen>Agent</fen> causes to have a particular emotional state.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>This Frame Element is for expressions that elaborate the manner in which the <fen>Agent</fen> affects the <fen>Experiencer</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Resulting_action
Arg.definition: <def-root>What the <fen>Agent</fen> intends to make the <fen>Experiencer</fen> do by causing a certain experience and the <fen>Experiencer</fen> actually does.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Agent</fen> affects the <fen>Experiencer</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Agent</fen> affects the <fen>Experiencer</fen> </def-root >

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Instrument</fen> with which the <fen>Agent</fen> brings about the emotional state.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Purpose</fen> for which an <fen>Agent</fen> brings about the emotional state in the <fen>Experiencer</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition:
<def-root>Degree to which the <fen>Experiencer</fen> ends up feeling an emotion.
<ex>He <fex name="Degr">completely</fex> <t>terrorized</t> her.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: terrorize.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: create and maintain a feeling of terror in.

lexUnit.name: entertain.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: provide with amusement or enjoyment.

lexUnit.name: amuse.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: cause to find something funny.
